bug.author: narayanacharya6
bug.summary: [BUG] Fix broken link in the README for entailment examples.
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
The link for the Multi NLI dataset entailment example for a local setup is broken in the README. <denchmark-h:h3>How do we replicate the bug?</denchmark-h>
Click the link for 'entailment_multinli_bert.ipynb' in the README at the end. Link redirects to a 404 GitHub page. <denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior (i.e. solution)</denchmark-h>
Clicking on the example notebook link should open the example python notebook file name 'entailment_multinli_transformers.ipynb' in the same directory instead of redirecting to a 404. <denchmark-h:h3>Other Comments</denchmark-h>
None
